document.full_text: at least 17 rebels and three law enforcement officers were killed on monday in russia's mainly muslim north caucasus region, russian media reported, citing the national anti-terror committee.
document.title: clashes in russia's caucasus kill 20: reports
lines_and_colors: at least 17 rebels and three law enforcement officers were killed on monday in russia's mainly muslim north caucasus region, russian media reported, citing the national anti-terror committee.
